title: Aufguss: A Sauna Ritual
description: Experience the transformative power of traditional German sauna ceremony. Amanda guides you through waves of heat, aromatherapy, and mindful breathing in this immersive wellness ritual.

title: Cold Water Immersion
description: Awaken your body's natural resilience through guided cold exposure. This practice combines breathwork with cold water therapy to boost circulation, reduce inflammation, and enhance mental clarity.

title: Breathwork & Stillness
description: Where sound becomes stillness. Join us in November for a meditative ritual inviting you to lie back, close your eyes, and be gently held by waves of sound. Using gongs, bowls and harmonic tones, the Master creates a space where tension dissolves and your nervous system can deeply settle.

title: Community Hot Plunge
description: A communal wellness experience combining sauna, hot springs therapy, and group reflection. Connect with like-minded individuals while nourishing your body and spirit.
